title: Top Chefs Discover Denver's Fast Growing Restaurant Scene
teaser: Thanks in part to the nearby oil and gas boom, Denver is seeing a flood of affluent professionals with a hunger for good food.When you think of the restaurant scene, Denver may not come to mind. But that's just the latest change for a city whose population has ballooned in the last couple of years.
